flawed_nl_solution:
Madeline needs 1200+400+200+60+200 = $<<1200+400+200+60+200=2080>>2080 to pay all of her bills.
She will need to work $2080/$15 per hour = 138.66666666666666 hours.
She will need to work 139 hours to pay all of her bills

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2060, not 2080. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
